description: Maximal value of prime divisors of numbers in reduced residue system for n.
comments: The smallest number for which a(n)=k is the n-th Euclid number (A006862=A002110 + 1).
references: Z. Abel, E. Demaine, M. Demaine, H. Matsui and G. Rote, Common Developments of Several Different Orthogonal Boxes, http://2011.cccg.ca/PDFschedule/papers/paper49.pdf
example: For n=60 a(n)=1 since in RRS[ 60 ] only 1 and prime powers occur (see A051250).
author: _Labos Elemer_
